headline: Ask HN: What Is a 'Misinformation Reporter'
description:
I was listening to BBC's global news podcast this morning and was somewhat surprised to hear a reporter describe themselves as a "climate misinformation reporter". Seems odd to me. Is this a new thing? NYT is hiring for this role https://talkingbiznews.com/biz-news-help-wanted/ny-times-seeks-misinformation-reporter-on-tech-desk/

'This is a beat that intersects with almost every part of the report, including media, politics, health and international, so an ability and willingness to collaborate is essential. A sense of humor is also required'

Not much mention of how a 'misinformation reporter' is different from a regular journalist.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 什么是 "错误信息记者"？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 什麼是 "錯誤信息記者"？
description_zh-Hans:
今天早上我在听BBC的全球新闻播客，听到一个记者把自己说成是 "气候错误信息记者"，我感到有些惊讶。 对我来说似乎很奇怪。 这是一个新事物吗？ 纽约时报》正在为这个角色招聘https://talkingbiznews.com/biz-news-help-wanted/ny-times-seeks-misinformation-reporter-on-tech-desk/

"这是一个几乎与报道的每个部分都有交集的栏目，包括媒体、政治、健康和国际，所以合作的能力和意愿是必不可少的。幽默感也是必须的。

没有过多提及 "错误信息记者 "与普通记者有什么不同。
description_zh-Hant:

"這是一個幾乎與報道的每個部分都有交集的欄目，包括媒體、政治、健康和國際，所以合作的能力和意願是必不可少的。幽默感也是必須的。
